scripts.start: npm install && npm run compile && electron ./app
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && npm run compile && electron-packager out Onshape --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=all --version=0.36.1 --icon=build/icon.ico --asar=true
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run compile && node build/build.js --pack --sign='Vladimir Krivosheev'
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win && npm run pack:win64 && mv 'dist/win/Onshape Setup.exe' 'dist/win/Onshape Setup x64.exe' && npm run pack:win32
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
